questions.question: Examine the overall traffic distribution to uncover any hidden dependencies between traffic entry types and financial product categories.

answer.value: Social traffic (Alipay/WeChat Entry) is strongly linked to short-term credit products (Consumer Credit).

key_insights: Social traffic (Alipay/WeChat Entry) dominates short-term credit products, while offline channels dominate wealth and insurance products.

reasoning.reasoning: The goal is to uncover non-obvious relationships, so a broad, interactive examination of all flows is necessary.
